column4: To get Flash working, I'm going to completely uninstall Firefox and reinstall it. When I get it back on, do I need to install both 3.0 and 3.5?
i doubt if reinstalling \ firefox will make flash work
I'm running out of ideas haha
flash is a pain. see if it works in Opera or Chrome/Chromium perhaps
thers some extra flash-related package that might be needed i recall for sound in some cases
what does chromium have to do with flash?
its another browser you can test. Ive had better luck with flash working in it then opera
On my repo it's a 'fast paced, arcade-style, scrolling space shooter'
its not in the repos. its the new browser by google.
the firefox that came on my 64bit  Karmic.. is 64bit... from what that dialog shows
Did you do an upgrade or clean install
been using beta and rc.. and i always do clean installs
what does uname -a say about your system
You got the 32bit installed it seems...
if you got more then 4 gb ram.. you may want to reinstall 64bit.. or if you do a lot of encoding video or other hard core stuff.
